name: The house with too many zombies in it
name_original: The house with too many zombies in it
description: HOGuru Presents: The House With Too Many Zombies In It is a new action game from the writer of hit horror film COME TRUE! Set during a zombie apocalypse, it tells the story of Crash Bromwell, who has been chosen by god to save the world - unfortunately, he was not also told HOW to do that.
